resources.string: Well done, you have successfully book

PING PONG:
The amount of people you have in your group size will determine the amount of tables and the length of time we can allocate you. Our tables have been designed for our customers to eat, drink and play around the tables with enough standing space for up to 20 people. around the tables with enough standing space for up to 20 people.
At the time of booking, we will charge:
RM 6 per person for groups of 2-29
RM5 per person for groups of 30+
Any changes or cancellations are not refundable
